fullText: Pass Over is a play that announces itself as urgent and necessary, and it largely lives up to that promise in Danya Taymor's smart, stripped-down production.

bwwExcerpt: In rewriting for Broadway, [Nwandu] has gone even further. Not only has she decided to push the play past tragedy into something else, but she has also, in its last 10 minutes, let its innate surrealism fully flower in a daring and self-consciously theatrical way.
